resources.string: A continuation of the saga created by George Lucas and set thirty years after Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983).

Cinephile is the worldâ€™s most popular and authoritative source for movie, TV and celebrity content. The Cinephile consumer site (www.cinephiles.xyz) is the #1 movie website in the world with a combined web and mobile audience of more than 200 million unique monthly visitors. Cinefile offers a searchable database of more than 180 million data items including more than 3 million movies, TV and entertainment programs and more than 6 million cast and crew members.
